author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
Two killed in accident

A 50-year-old woman and her two-and-a-half-year-old grandson were killed in a collision involving a car and a goods auto rickshaw on Pollachi-Udumalpet Road on Thursday. The deceased were identified as Saraswathy, wife of Manickam of VVG Nagar, Palani, and their grandson Lakshan. Manickam and the goods auto rickshaw driver Dhandapani (34) sustained injuries and were hospitalised. Gomangalam police have registered a case.
title: CRIME NOTES
